title: RITO PLS RUNE PAGE ORGANISATION OPTIONS PLSPLSPLSPLS
body: Can you please give us the option to just drag and drop our Rune pages around please? My OCD can't take it anymore :/

replies.body:
Yes...

Yeah I just did it.

Sorry I said "Yes..." because I knew you could but I hadn't tried it in a while, so I tried it but I already sent the comment so I just edited saying "Yeah I just did it."

Sorry, you must be smelling my old stench when I was in bronze, I was a really bad troll back then. But now I'm like all, I guess cheerful, supportive and well only like 4% troll, because occasionally me and 4 other friends just go in a normals game an just do whatever Ultimate Bravery tells us to do (Ult bravery is kinda fun but it is worst then Teemo sometimes http://www.ultimate-bravery.com/ there's a URL if you don't know what ult bravery is.)
I know what Ult Bravery is haha. Not but forreal now, you can't drag and drop pages can you?
Yes I can drag & drop runes into the pages.
I meant drag and drop the rune pages themselves...
Oh, I thought you ment the runes not the pages my bad. No I don't think you can do that. You should be able to now that I fully understand this question I'll vote.

What he means is that, you should be able to drag and drop rune 'pages'

If I have :
Page 1: Full AD
Page 2: TONS OF DAMAGE
Page 3 : Caitlyn Pro Junlge
Page 4 : Full AP

I can drag page 4 (Full AP) to where page 2 is, and the rest in alphabetical order to satisfy my OCD needs on OCE.

End result : 
Page 1: Full AD
Page 2: Full AP
Page 3 : Caitlyn Pro Junlge
Page 4 : TONS OF DAMAGE

As per demonstrated here in this video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tnzz-eFmKaw
I need that guy in my house while I go on holidays.
